pageTitle: Kona Red Princess Cut Hawaiian Dress - bananajack.com
title: Banana Jacks' Women's Short Tank Dress Size Chart
textBeforeTable: Size Chart Womens Princess Cut Dress Size Chart Size Chart: Product Details Made in Hawaii. Done on 100% super soft rayon poplin fabric for a very light - breezy fit. This princess cut is a short dress (upper calf) with a zippered back, darts, an a-line hem cut and a playful heart-shaped neckline. The Kona Red is Beautiful Red/Orange Hibiscus flower with palm leaves on an off white background. Product Description International: Order 5 or more items. US Customers: Order 3 or more items.
